title: Russia Hacks US History, Facebook Owns You 10.13.17
itunes:title: Russia Hacks US History, Facebook Owns You 10.13.17
description:
In episode 5, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Laci Mosley to discuss Asheville airport bomb, Russia messing with the US for years, Toyota's ad campaigns for different races, Matt Damon's comments on Weinstein, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
